title: Method Reference
description:
Create a list of names and use forEach with a method reference to print each name.

List: ["Alice", "Bob"]

Expected output:
Alice
Bob
instructions:
Create a list of names and use forEach with a method reference to print each name.

List: ["Alice", "Bob"]

hints.text: Method reference syntax: ClassName::methodName or object::methodName
System.out::println is a method reference to the println method

commonMistakes.mistake: Using System.out.println() with parentheses in method reference
